channel.title: Qubes-Whonix Security Disadvantages - Help Wanted!
channel.description:
**[kloak](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Keystroke_Deanonymization#Kloak)** ([Anti Keystroke Deanonymization](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Keystroke_Deanonymization))
* Already installed by default in [Non-Qubes-Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Non-Qubes-Whonix) for a long time. * Not on the horizon for [Qubes-Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes). Qubes VM kernel non-default issue. * Qubes issue: https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/2558
----
**[Linux Kernel Runtime Guard (LKRG)](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Linux_Kernel_Runtime_Guard_LKRG)**
* Soon to be installed by default in Non-Qubes-Whonix. * Not soon to be installed in Qubes-Whonix by default because Qubes is not using Qubes VM kernel by default yet. * Qubes issues: * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/5461 * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/1850 * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/5212 * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/5667
----
**[tirdad](https://github.com/Whonix/tirdad)** (TCP ISN CPU Information Leak Protection.) * Soon to be installed by default in Non-Qubes-Whonix. * Not soon to be installed in Qubes-Whonix by default because Qubes is not using Qubes VM kernel by default yet. * Qubes issue: https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/5212
----
**[Kernel Hardening through Kernel Boot Parameters](https://github.com/Whonix/security-misc/blob/master/etc/default/grub.d/40_kernel_hardening.cfg)**
* Already installed by default in Non-Qubes-Whonix for a long time. * Not on the horizon for Qubes-Whonix. Qubes VM kernel non-default issue. * Qubes issues: * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/5212 * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/2045
----
**[Strong Linux User Account Separation](https://github.com/Whonix/security-misc) / [Protection against Bruteforcing Linux User Account Passwords](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Permissions#Bruteforcing_Linux_User_Account_Passwords)**
* Already default in Non-Qubes-Whonix. * Might be fixeable in Qubes-Whonix * https://forums.whonix.org/t/qubes-sudo-su-root-hardening-development-discussion/8561 * Qubes issues: * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-core-agent-linux/pull/171 * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/2695 * https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/1885
----
----
**[apparmor-profile-everything](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/apparmor-profile-everything) (AppArmor for everything. APT, systemd, init, all systemd units, all applications)**
* In development. * Proof of concept functional in Non-Qubes-Whonix. * https://forums.whonix.org/t/using-apparmor-profile-everything-on-debian-buster/8650 * Broken in Qubes-Whonix. * Only developed for Non-Qubes-Whonix by @madaidan. * Nobody working on Qubes-Whonix support. * [github](https://github.com/Whonix/apparmor-profile-everything) / [forum discussion](https://forums.whonix.org/t/apparmor-for-complete-system-including-init-pid1-systemd-everything-full-system-mac-policy/8339)
----
**[hardened-kernel](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hardened-kernel) [patch](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hardened-kernel#linux-hardened) and [config](https://github.com/Whonix/hardened-kernel/blob/master/usr/share/hardened-kernel/hardened-vm-kernel)**
* In development. * Proof of concept functional in Non-Qubes-Whonix. * Broken in Qubes-Whonix. * Only developed for Non-Qubes-Whonix by @madaidan. * Nobody working on Qubes-Whonix support. * [github](https://github.com/Whonix/hardened-kernel) / [forum discussion](https://forums.whonix.org/t/kernel-recompilation-for-better-hardening/7598)
----
Please help fixing these issues!
